channel.title: Final Devolution 2.4 help
channel.description: Hey everyone, I need help with my Final Devolution 2.4 source. There's this glitch when ever a player or NPC kills me, I go into my death stage, and I stay there. It teleports me to the death place, but I stay laying down, and don't get back up unless I logout. Any ideas on how to fix this? Thanks.

item.title: Final Devolution 2.4 help
item.dc:creator: @Rat_racer550 Rat racer550
item.description:
@Rat_racer550 wrote:

Hey everyone, I need help with my Final Devolution 2.4 source. There’s this glitch when ever a player or NPC kills me, I go into my death stage, and I stay there. It teleports me to the death place, but I stay laying down, and don’t get back up unless I logout. Any ideas on how to fix this?
Thanks.

Read full topic
